original:
Wasn't it you, Tamers of the Old 
Union, who made the Defrag Plan? 
You came up with it to try to save 
the Digital World.
Then, when the Ancient Tree went 
berserk, you were dragged in...
and it made you 'Digimon Replicas'
...effectively Eraser prototypes.
If you consider Erasers to be
monsters, then you're no different.
If you say that nobody wishes to 
become such beings, then...
I'll send you back to the Ancient 
Tree's Data Source right now!
Just like I did to your comrades 
and their Digimon!
translation:
Wasn't it you, Tamers of the Old 
Union, who made the Defrag Plan? 
You came up with it to try to save 
the Digital World.
Then, when the Ancient Tree went 
berserk, you were dragged in...
and it made you 'Digimon Replicas'
...effectively Eraser prototypes.
If you consider Erasers to be
monsters, then you're no different.
If you say that nobody wishes to 
become such beings, then...
I'll send you back to the Ancient 
Tree's Data Source right now!
Just like I did to your comrades 
and their Digimon!

original:
We know full well that we're 
abominations! 
That's exactly why we're telling 
you how messed up this is!
translation:
We know full well that we're 
abominations! 
That's exactly why we're telling 
you how messed up this is!

original:
As long as ^P exists, 
you won't get away with this. 
Even if you erase the three of 
us, it changes nothing!
translation:
As long as ^P exists, 
you won't get away with this. 
Even if you erase the three of 
us, it changes nothing!

original:
Uhhh.... I have a bad feeling about
this...
Why do we sound like characters 
giving their final lines before dying?
translation:
Uhhh.... I have a bad feeling about
this...
Why do we sound like characters 
giving their final lines before dying?

original: ERASE!!!!!!!
translation: ERASE!!!!!!!

original:
^P... 
You probably didn't know this, but
Those three tried to warn everyone 
originally, to tell them the truth. 
About how the Digital World won't 
last at the rate it's going.
However, not a single Tamer paid
any attention to them...
Instead, they came to me, and
began disappearing, one by one...
Such a pleasant story, isn't it...?

People believe those who they
chose to believe.
Not those they can believe in,
nor those they should believe.
No, they cling to whatever sounds 
good to them, their beliefs...
And in the end, they lose it all...
as expected.
translation:
^P... 
You probably didn't know this, but
Those three tried to warn everyone 
originally, to tell them the truth. 
About how the Digital World won't 
last at the rate it's going.
However, not a single Tamer paid
any attention to them...
Instead, they came to me, and
began disappearing, one by one...
Such a pleasant story, isn't it...?

People believe those who they
chose to believe.
Not those they can believe in,
nor those they should believe.
No, they cling to whatever sounds 
good to them, their beliefs...
And in the end, they lose it all...
as expected.

original:
Those pitiful losers have been 
absorbed into the tree now.
The only problem left... 
...is you.
You have too much power, and too 
many people believe in you.
That's why I've been broadcasting
everything for the world to see...
So that I can completely crush you
in front of all of your friends.
Then no one will dare oppose me
again. But try not to fret, okay?
translation:
Those pitiful losers have been 
absorbed into the tree now.
The only problem left... 
...is you.
You have too much power, and too 
many people believe in you.
That's why I've been broadcasting
everything for the world to see...
So that I can completely crush you
in front of all of your friends.
Then no one will dare oppose me
again. But try not to fret, okay?

original:
Once you bear witness to my 
true form...
All of those foolish dreams you've 
been hanging on to will vanish.
translation:
Once you bear witness to my 
true form...
All of those foolish dreams you've 
been hanging on to will vanish.

original:
The true power of the Ancient Tree
is right here, in my hands. 
The data of all those consumed as 
trash? It lies here, within me. 
Don't you see?
I am now the Digital World, itself!
It's time to get a taste of your 
own foolishness... 
for trying to turn against the world!
translation:
The true power of the Ancient Tree
is right here, in my hands. 
The data of all those consumed as 
trash? It lies here, within me. 
Don't you see?
I am now the Digital World, itself!
It's time to get a taste of your 
own foolishness... 
for trying to turn against the world!

original:
...Gah! What are you protecting 
with these foolish actions of yours?
Those useless pieces of trash? 
The ones messing everything up?
They're foolish, selfish, dirty,
disorganized, annoying and ugly!
Digimon are nothing but viruses, 
devouring the Digital World!
All I did was destroy them and
gather up their data...
All for the sake of a beautiful, 
well-organized Digital World!
...The only unique creation this
world needs is me!
translation:
...Gah! What are you protecting 
with these foolish actions of yours?
Those useless pieces of trash? 
The ones messing everything up?
They're foolish, selfish, dirty,
disorganized, annoying and ugly!
Digimon are nothing but viruses, 
devouring the Digital World!
All I did was destroy them and
gather up their data...
All for the sake of a beautiful, 
well-organized Digital World!
...The only unique creation this
world needs is me!

original:
All will become one! 
All will be the same!
That is how it should be!
The new Digital World!
Nothing useless, no distortion, 
no doubts nor any waste!
Just a wonderful, beautiful
world! And you too, will...
Become... one... with... u...s... 
ugh...
Gaaaahhhh?!
translation:
All will become one! 
All will be the same!
That is how it should be!
The new Digital World!
Nothing useless, no distortion, 
no doubts nor any waste!
Just a wonderful, beautiful
world! And you too, will...
Become... one... with... u...s... 
ugh...
Gaaaahhhh?!

original:
Yo, Kernel...!

Did you really think you could 
absorb us unscathed?!
We've started wrecking your 
body from the inside out!
translation:
Yo, Kernel...!

Did you really think you could 
absorb us unscathed?!
We've started wrecking your 
body from the inside out!

original:
What are you waiting for, 
^P?! Now's your chance!
Kernel is data-linked to the 
Ancient Tree! 
There's nowhere he can run to!
translation:
What are you waiting for, 
^P?! Now's your chance!
Kernel is data-linked to the 
Ancient Tree! 
There's nowhere he can run to!

original:
You were meant to be the bait,
^P, but oh well. 
Beat the stuffing out of him!
Grind him to dust and 
send him flying♪
translation:
You were meant to be the bait,
^P, but oh well. 
Beat the stuffing out of him!
Grind him to dust and 
send him flying♪

original:
Y-you prattling dogs! Your 
resistance is pointless...!
This won't save you from being 
wiped out with the rest!
Soon... your voices... even... 
your memories... will vanish!
You fools will... be annihilated...
Gone, forever...!
translation:
Y-you prattling dogs! Your 
resistance is pointless...!
This won't save you from being 
wiped out with the rest!
Soon... your voices... even... 
your memories... will vanish!
You fools will... be annihilated...
Gone, forever...!

original:
...like we care!

We'll show you how persistent
we dogs can be...
Once we've gotten ahold of our
prey...!
translation:
...like we care!

We'll show you how persistent
we dogs can be...
Once we've gotten ahold of our
prey...!

original:
...W-why... why am I..
H-how is... this...
T-this... this is...
...s-stop... l-let go..!
I'm... fading... I don't...
Don't... w-want to... 
...dis... appear...
...M-memories... my...
c-consciousnes... they're all...
all... d-disappea... ri... 
..............................
translation:
...W-why... why am I..
H-how is... this...
T-this... this is...
...s-stop... l-let go..!
I'm... fading... I don't...
Don't... w-want to... 
...dis... appear...
...M-memories... my...
c-consciousnes... they're all...
all... d-disappea... ri... 
..............................

original:
That guy sure was a pain, right
up 'til the end.
But we just force-ended Kernel's 
task.
Looks like we can give ourselves 
a pat on the back... 
That is, if we can figure out how 
the heck to get out of here.
translation:
That guy sure was a pain, right
up 'til the end.
But we just force-ended Kernel's 
task.
Looks like we can give ourselves 
a pat on the back... 
That is, if we can figure out how 
the heck to get out of here.

original:
Hey, relax, we'll figure it 
out. 
Dos is already accessing the 
Ancient Tree. 
More importantly, ^P, 
you did great! 
You're even almost good enough to
become one of the Bandits!
We knew you were good, but we 
didn't think you were THAT good!
translation:
Hey, relax, we'll figure it 
out. 
Dos is already accessing the 
Ancient Tree. 
More importantly, ^P, 
you did great! 
You're even almost good enough to
become one of the Bandits!
We knew you were good, but we 
didn't think you were THAT good!

original:
...........................

It looks like we may have a 
problem. 
Before he shut down, Kernel...
ran the Catastrophe Code. 
Put simply... we have 30 seconds 
before this place self-destructs.
translation:
...........................

It looks like we may have a 
problem. 
Before he shut down, Kernel...
ran the Catastrophe Code. 
Put simply... we have 30 seconds 
before this place self-destructs.

original:
Well... Looks like it's the Bandits'
time to shine.
We'll contain the damage so it 
doesn't spread outside.
^P, would you mind heading
out ahead of us?
translation:
Well... Looks like it's the Bandits'
time to shine.
We'll contain the damage so it 
doesn't spread outside.
^P, would you mind heading
out ahead of us?

original:
Enough whining! Just get the hell
out of this place, now!
translation:
Enough whining! Just get the hell
out of this place, now!

original:
^P, don't get the 
wrong idea. We're right behind you.
There's no way we're going down
together with that idiot.
translation:
^P, don't get the 
wrong idea. We're right behind you.
There's no way we're going down
together with that idiot.

original:
Don't worry, we're pretty good
at this kinda stuff.
We'll wrap this up and bail out in 
no time.
translation:
Don't worry, we're pretty good
at this kinda stuff.
We'll wrap this up and bail out in 
no time.

original:
That's right, everyone has 
something they're good at.
And when it comes to escapes,
we're the best in the Digital World!
translation:
That's right, everyone has 
something they're good at.
And when it comes to escapes,
we're the best in the Digital World!

original:
That's why I'm saying, you'll just 
be in our way if you stick around.
We're doing you a favor here, so
you better pay us back later!
Don't forget that!
translation:
That's why I'm saying, you'll just 
be in our way if you stick around.
We're doing you a favor here, so
you better pay us back later!
Don't forget that!

original:
Now then... let's quit with the 
struggling, shall we? 
Either way, we've done what we 
can. Nothing else matters.
translation:
Now then... let's quit with the 
struggling, shall we? 
Either way, we've done what we 
can. Nothing else matters.

original:
We sure chose a difficult way to
live our lives, didn't we?
What the Selectors left with the
one who defeated them...
Was a favor that can't be returned
and a debt that can't be repaid...
translation:
We sure chose a difficult way to
live our lives, didn't we?
What the Selectors left with the
one who defeated them...
Was a favor that can't be returned
and a debt that can't be repaid...

original:
If we didn't try and act so cool, 
we might have had it a little better.
But, well... it is what it is...

...and it wasn't so bad.
translation:
If we didn't try and act so cool, 
we might have had it a little better.
But, well... it is what it is...

...and it wasn't so bad.

original:
Hey, Hiroyuki?!
Pandamon?!
What have you been doing this 
whole time?!
...........................

Jeez, this isn't the time to be
playing around...
translation:
Hey, Hiroyuki?!
Pandamon?!
What have you been doing this 
whole time?!
...........................

Jeez, this isn't the time to be
playing around...

original:
Anyway, what was with that huge
tremor, and the lightning...
It made Terriermon and the others 
pass out, and they won't wake up.
translation:
Anyway, what was with that huge
tremor, and the lightning...
It made Terriermon and the others 
pass out, and they won't wake up.

original:
Even weirder than that...

How did the DigiBase return to 
normal in a split second..?
translation:
Even weirder than that...

How did the DigiBase return to 
normal in a split second..?

original: Oh, sorry for the wait!♪
translation: Oh, sorry for the wait!♪

original:
Sorry about that, we ran into a
snag with the preparations.
But I've left the rest to Calumon
and Pandamon, now.
translation:
Sorry about that, we ran into a
snag with the preparations.
But I've left the rest to Calumon
and Pandamon, now.

original:
We're gonna be late in welcoming
^P back!
I swear, you half-pint airhead, 
one of these days I'm gonna...
..............................
......................... Huh?
Hold on Hiroyuki, what do you
mean by 'preparations'?!
Don't tell me you've been out
causing trouble again?!
translation:
We're gonna be late in welcoming
^P back!
I swear, you half-pint airhead, 
one of these days I'm gonna...
..............................
......................... Huh?
Hold on Hiroyuki, what do you
mean by 'preparations'?!
Don't tell me you've been out
causing trouble again?!

original:
Of course not! I'd never do that!
It's just... uhhh...
.........Gah!
I-i-i-it's nothing, alright?!
I-I was just saying goodbye
to everyone!
translation:
Of course not! I'd never do that!
It's just... uhhh...
.........Gah!
I-i-i-it's nothing, alright?!
I-I was just saying goodbye
to everyone!

original:
Asuka, big bro, Patamon's calling
for us to hurry up...!
You'll both be left behind if you 
keep messing around, you know?
translation:
Asuka, big bro, Patamon's calling
for us to hurry up...!
You'll both be left behind if you 
keep messing around, you know?

original:
Okay! I'll be right there, after I've
taught this idiot a lesson!
translation:
Okay! I'll be right there, after I've
taught this idiot a lesson!

original:
I can see right through your lies,
you know.
Your voice trembles, your eyes
dart all over the place...
If you're up to something again,
I swear...
I'll beat you so hard your hair'll
turn straight, got that?!
translation:
I can see right through your lies,
you know.
Your voice trembles, your eyes
dart all over the place...
If you're up to something again,
I swear...
I'll beat you so hard your hair'll
turn straight, got that?!

original:
You're so mean, Asuka!
I have no clue what you mean!
You're making my poor little 
imagination run wild, accusing me...
translation:
You're so mean, Asuka!
I have no clue what you mean!
You're making my poor little 
imagination run wild, accusing me...

original:
What's wrong, Yui? Has Hiroyuki
done something again?
translation:
What's wrong, Yui? Has Hiroyuki
done something again?

original:
Ummmmm... sort of..? 

Seems like he did somethiing, but 
it's not my problem this time! 
Shall we just get going?
translation:
Ummmmm... sort of..? 

Seems like he did somethiing, but 
it's not my problem this time! 
Shall we just get going?

original:
Okay Asuka, big bro, you two 
take your time! 
We're going to go and board 
the Digiship first♪
translation:
Okay Asuka, big bro, you two 
take your time! 
We're going to go and board 
the Digiship first♪

original:
Terriermon and the others don't 
seems to be waking up...
translation:
Terriermon and the others don't 
seems to be waking up...

original:
We don't have time to stick 
around and wait...
If we stay too much longer, Yui's
DigiComa might return again, right?
translation:
We don't have time to stick 
around and wait...
If we stay too much longer, Yui's
DigiComa might return again, right?

original:
Well, that's what AncientWisemon 
told us, at least.
They said it should be fine once
we return to the Real World.
translation:
Well, that's what AncientWisemon 
told us, at least.
They said it should be fine once
we return to the Real World.

original:
Gatomon, Renamon,
Terriermon...
Thank you for everything you've
done for us...
Let's meet again someday... 
........................ okay?
translation:
Gatomon, Renamon,
Terriermon...
Thank you for everything you've
done for us...
Let's meet again someday... 
........................ okay?

original:
We've caused them a lot of trouble
and they helped us out so much.
At the very least, I figured we
should leave them a present.
I've prepared something
that should wake them up♪
translation:
We've caused them a lot of trouble
and they helped us out so much.
At the very least, I figured we
should leave them a present.
I've prepared something
that should wake them up♪

original:
Wha?! 
W-w-w-what was that?!
Is the DigiBase under attack again?!
translation:
Wha?! 
W-w-w-what was that?!
Is the DigiBase under attack again?!

original:
Don't fret, Terriermon, that's
impossible.
After all, ^P defeated
the Selectors, remember?
translation:
Don't fret, Terriermon, that's
impossible.
After all, ^P defeated
the Selectors, remember?

original:
B-but don't you hear that?!
Those bangs and explosions?!
Quick, Gatomon, check the
system!
translation:
B-but don't you hear that?!
Those bangs and explosions?!
Quick, Gatomon, check the
system!

original:
It's not the Selectors, nor is it
an issue within the system.
We're not under attack or in any
kind of trouble, but...
I've seen this in the database...
What was it called again...?
translation:
It's not the Selectors, nor is it
an issue within the system.
We're not under attack or in any
kind of trouble, but...
I've seen this in the database...
What was it called again...?

original:
W-w-w-why are you so casual 
about this?!
We need to run, or hide, or
counterattack, right now!
translation:
W-w-w-why are you so casual 
about this?!
We need to run, or hide, or
counterattack, right now!

original:
Calm down, Terriermon, 
everything's alright.
It's just... uhmm... it's 'that'...
you know... 'That'!
translation:
Calm down, Terriermon, 
everything's alright.
It's just... uhmm... it's 'that'...
you know... 'That'!

original:
I-I-I-I-I'm totally calm, can't you
see that?!
translation:
I-I-I-I-I'm totally calm, can't you
see that?!

original:
Renamon, Terriermon, Gatomon! 
Are you awake, Calu?
Come watch the fireworks
with everyone, Calu!
They're so bright and beautiful,
Calu...♪
translation:
Renamon, Terriermon, Gatomon! 
Are you awake, Calu?
Come watch the fireworks
with everyone, Calu!
They're so bright and beautiful,
Calu...♪

original:
That's it! I finally remembered!

In the Real World, they make those
explosions during celebrations.
translation:
That's it! I finally remembered!

In the Real World, they make those
explosions during celebrations.

original:
Explosions during celebrations?!
Isn't that like harassment?!
Why on earth would anyone do
something like that?!
translation:
Explosions during celebrations?!
Isn't that like harassment?!
Why on earth would anyone do
something like that?!

original:
They're not normal explosions,
they're extremely beautiful.
They're made from carbon, sodium,
lithium, and they mix them, and...
...well, you'll understand when you 
see them. Shall we go watch?
translation:
They're not normal explosions,
they're extremely beautiful.
They're made from carbon, sodium,
lithium, and they mix them, and...
...well, you'll understand when you 
see them. Shall we go watch?

original:
H-hey, wait, Renamon!
Wait for me!
translation:
H-hey, wait, Renamon!
Wait for me!

original:
Are you alright, Yui? 
You're not feeling unwell, are you?
translation:
Are you alright, Yui? 
You're not feeling unwell, are you?

original:
I was a little scared while travelling
on the Digiship, but...
I'm okay now. Thanks, Takuto.
translation:
I was a little scared while travelling
on the Digiship, but...
I'm okay now. Thanks, Takuto.

original:
Feels like it's been forever since
we were last here, doesn't it?
translation:
Feels like it's been forever since
we were last here, doesn't it?

original:
Hah ha!

Doesn't it feel like we went on this
huge awesome adventure?!
translation:
Hah ha!

Doesn't it feel like we went on this
huge awesome adventure?!

original:
No, it doesn't 'feel' like it...

We were definitely thrown into a 
BIG adventure.
translation:
No, it doesn't 'feel' like it...

We were definitely thrown into a 
BIG adventure.

original:
You were the one that dragged
everyone into this, brother.
You can't just talk so casually 
about it!
translation:
You were the one that dragged
everyone into this, brother.
You can't just talk so casually 
about it!

original:
Thanks for everything, everyone♪

Is everyone here? You're not
feeling unwell or anything?
translation:
Thanks for everything, everyone♪

Is everyone here? You're not
feeling unwell or anything?

original:
We're all fine!
Thanks for bringing us here!
translation:
We're all fine!
Thanks for bringing us here!

original:
Don't mention it!
It's us who should be thanking you.
You're the ones who came and 
saved everyone. 
We want to thank you all, from the
bottom of our hearts.
translation:
Don't mention it!
It's us who should be thanking you.
You're the ones who came and 
saved everyone. 
We want to thank you all, from the
bottom of our hearts.

original:
Awww, it was nothing! Seriously, 
you're embarrassing me...
Nyehehehe...♪
translation:
Awww, it was nothing! Seriously, 
you're embarrassing me...
Nyehehehe...♪

original:
You're not the one they're
thanking, idiot!
...Well I guess, in a way, they are.

After all, if it weren't for you, none
of this would have happened.
We would have never crossed over
to the Digital World.
So I guess you did play... a SMALL
role in helping the Digimon.
translation:
You're not the one they're
thanking, idiot!
...Well I guess, in a way, they are.

After all, if it weren't for you, none
of this would have happened.
We would have never crossed over
to the Digital World.
So I guess you did play... a SMALL
role in helping the Digimon.

original:
(gulp)...

Somehow, you praising me is 
scarier than you being angry...
translation:
(gulp)...

Somehow, you praising me is 
scarier than you being angry...

original:
.........................
Hey, Patamon...?
Weren't we in the Digital World
for a long time...?
Then how come the festival from
the night we left is still going on...?
translation:
.........................
Hey, Patamon...?
Weren't we in the Digital World
for a long time...?
Then how come the festival from
the night we left is still going on...?

original:
How foolish of you, Yui...

They're all waiting for my return,
of course!
...Just kidding! Yahoo! 
I can't wait to eat grilled squid!♪
translation:
How foolish of you, Yui...

They're all waiting for my return,
of course!
...Just kidding! Yahoo! 
I can't wait to eat grilled squid!♪

original:
Oops, I guess I forgot to tell 
you...
Time passes a lot faster in the 
Digital World than the Real World.
That's why all that time you 
spent working hard in our world...
only translates to a short time 
passing in your world.
translation:
Oops, I guess I forgot to tell 
you...
Time passes a lot faster in the 
Digital World than the Real World.
That's why all that time you 
spent working hard in our world...
only translates to a short time 
passing in your world.

original:
So it's like a digital version of 
the "Dragon Palace" fairytale, 
but in reverse? Time passes in 
the Digital World but not here?
translation:
So it's like a digital version of 
the "Dragon Palace" fairytale, 
but in reverse? Time passes in 
the Digital World but not here?

original:
Wait, doesn’t the hero in that story
get a magic box or something? 
It keeps him young, but I don't 
need that. Maybe Asuka can have it!
translation:
Wait, doesn’t the hero in that story
get a magic box or something? 
It keeps him young, but I don't 
need that. Maybe Asuka can have it!

original:
I think you need it more, big bro.
If opening it turns you old like 
the hero in the story, maybe you'll
mature a little!
translation:
I think you need it more, big bro.
If opening it turns you old like 
the hero in the story, maybe you'll
mature a little!

original:
... Honestly, it wouldn't make a 
difference. 
Old or young, Hiroyuki will always 
stay the same.
translation:
... Honestly, it wouldn't make a 
difference. 
Old or young, Hiroyuki will always 
stay the same.

original:
Well, I had better start heading 
back to the Digital World, ok?
If the people here see a Digimon, 
it'll cause a commotion. 
I have to return this Digiship to
the Bandits, too...
translation:
Well, I had better start heading 
back to the Digital World, ok?
If the people here see a Digimon, 
it'll cause a commotion. 
I have to return this Digiship to
the Bandits, too...

original:
...........................

Hey... Patamon?
If anything happens again...
...........................

No, it's nothing, forget I said
anything.
The Digital World is at peace, 
now, anyhow...
translation:
...........................

Hey... Patamon?
If anything happens again...
...........................

No, it's nothing, forget I said
anything.
The Digital World is at peace, 
now, anyhow...

original:
Could you thank everyone back
at the DigiBase for us?
Tell them we had a lot of fun in
the Digital World, too!
translation:
Could you thank everyone back
at the DigiBase for us?
Tell them we had a lot of fun in
the Digital World, too!

original:
Me too! Tell them that I hope
they're all doing well...
translation:
Me too! Tell them that I hope
they're all doing well...

original:
Gatomon, Renamon, Terriermon...

It's too bad we didn't get to say
a proper goodbye...
Could you thank them for us?
translation:
Gatomon, Renamon, Terriermon...

It's too bad we didn't get to say
a proper goodbye...
Could you thank them for us?

original:
Wha...?
Oh, um... sure!
Well, see ya!
translation:
Wha...?
Oh, um... sure!
Well, see ya!

original:
Hey, uh... ^P...?

Everyone's saying goodbye as if
we'll never meet again, but...
If you just send an email to 
the DigiBase, we can come get you.
So be sure to come back to the
Digital World and play with us again!
We'll be looking forward to seeing
you all, ok..?♪
translation:
Hey, uh... ^P...?

Everyone's saying goodbye as if
we'll never meet again, but...
If you just send an email to 
the DigiBase, we can come get you.
So be sure to come back to the
Digital World and play with us again!
We'll be looking forward to seeing
you all, ok..?♪

original:
Obtained a key item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a key item!
^i

original: Huh...? Wait, seriously?
translation: Huh...? Wait, seriously?

original:
That's a relief...

I thought we'd be parting ways 
with the Digimon for good...
translation:
That's a relief...

I thought we'd be parting ways 
with the Digimon for good...

original:
Me too. But if we're able to go 
back any time...
Then I'd like to go back again soon!
translation:
Me too. But if we're able to go 
back any time...
Then I'd like to go back again soon!

original:
But next time, maybe we should
leave Hiroyuki behind...
translation:
But next time, maybe we should
leave Hiroyuki behind...

original:
Now that that's sorted,
I'm starving!
It's a festival isn't it? 
We haven't eaten a thing yet!
translation:
Now that that's sorted,
I'm starving!
It's a festival isn't it? 
We haven't eaten a thing yet!

original:
Time to eat up!
Festival food! Festival food!
translation:
Time to eat up!
Festival food! Festival food!

original:
Hey, big bro, wait for me! 
Don't go off on your own again!
translation:
Hey, big bro, wait for me! 
Don't go off on your own again!

original:
Ah! Wait for me! 
Yuiiiiiiiii...!
translation:
Ah! Wait for me! 
Yuiiiiiiiii...!

original:
Hey, ^P? Let's keep this
between us, but...
translation:
Hey, ^P? Let's keep this
between us, but...

original:
When I heard that a shooting star
had landed behind the mountain, 
I didn't really believe it.
But...
I couldn't help myself from 
quietly making a wish. 
And... I wished for something 
exciting to happen to us.
translation:
When I heard that a shooting star
had landed behind the mountain, 
I didn't really believe it.
But...
I couldn't help myself from 
quietly making a wish. 
And... I wished for something 
exciting to happen to us.

original:
I guess sometimes wishes do 
come true, don't they...?
translation:
I guess sometimes wishes do 
come true, don't they...?

original: Save clear data?
translation: Save clear data?

original: Yes
translation: Yes

original: No
translation: No

original:
You will return to the title screen.
Are you sure about not saving?
translation:
You will return to the title screen.
Are you sure about not saving?

original: Actually, I'll save.
translation: Actually, I'll save.

original: No, I don't want to save.
translation: No, I don't want to save.

original:
Yaaay, ^P! 
Welcome back!♪
translation:
Yaaay, ^P! 
Welcome back!♪

original:
Everyone's been eagerly awaiting
your return, ^P!
You're the great savior of the 
Digital World, after all!♪
We've missed you!
translation:
Everyone's been eagerly awaiting
your return, ^P!
You're the great savior of the 
Digital World, after all!♪
We've missed you!

original:
Asuka and the others are going to
hold a celebration for you, and...
...Uh-oh, I wasn't suppose to tell
you about that...!
A-anyway, everyone's waiting to
see you at the entrance!
translation:
Asuka and the others are going to
hold a celebration for you, and...
...Uh-oh, I wasn't suppose to tell
you about that...!
A-anyway, everyone's waiting to
see you at the entrance!

original: Oh! ^P! Welcome back!
translation: Oh! ^P! Welcome back!

original:
I always knew you'd be able to
handle it, but...
To think you accomplished it so
spectacularly...!
I was really moved just watching 
you!♪
translation:
I always knew you'd be able to
handle it, but...
To think you accomplished it so
spectacularly...!
I was really moved just watching 
you!♪

original:
Oh, that reminds me!

After everyone heard that you
defeated the Selectors...
We received a whole ton of 
requests on the Quest PC!
There's no rush, of course, 
but... 
When you get a moment, would you
mind taking a look at them?
translation:
Oh, that reminds me!

After everyone heard that you
defeated the Selectors...
We received a whole ton of 
requests on the Quest PC!
There's no rush, of course, 
but... 
When you get a moment, would you
mind taking a look at them?

original:
Whoaaaah! We've been waiting for
you, ^P!
translation:
Whoaaaah! We've been waiting for
you, ^P!

original:
^P, ^P, 
come quickly!
translation:
^P, ^P, 
come quickly!

original:
Once again, welcome back,
^P, aaand...
Congratulations on defeating the
Selectors! Yaaay! Yahoo!♪
You really are something else, you
know that, ^P?
I mean, you saved the whole
Digital World!♪
translation:
Once again, welcome back,
^P, aaand...
Congratulations on defeating the
Selectors! Yaaay! Yahoo!♪
You really are something else, you
know that, ^P?
I mean, you saved the whole
Digital World!♪

original:
Of course, you're a Platinum Tamer
so we knew you're strong, but...
Seeing just HOW strong you are 
was incredible!
translation:
Of course, you're a Platinum Tamer
so we knew you're strong, but...
Seeing just HOW strong you are 
was incredible!

original:
Seriously, you've grown 
unbelievably strong!
translation:
Seriously, you've grown 
unbelievably strong!

original:
Of course, you had it together 
from the very beginning, but...
Coming out on top like that? 
It was just too cool♪
translation:
Of course, you had it together 
from the very beginning, but...
Coming out on top like that? 
It was just too cool♪

original:
After pulling off such a huge feat,
its obvious they'd be cool.
SUPER cool, even!♪
translation:
After pulling off such a huge feat,
its obvious they'd be cool.
SUPER cool, even!♪

original:
Then what ^P needs now,
after all that...
Is a climax scene that'll keep the
audience on their toes!
So now, I shall...
translation:
Then what ^P needs now,
after all that...
Is a climax scene that'll keep the
audience on their toes!
So now, I shall...

original:
If YOU do something, the audience
won't be on their toes at all!
I don't know what you're planning
with this 'audience' and 'next' talk,
But if you even TRY something 
weird I'll pummel you, got that?
translation:
If YOU do something, the audience
won't be on their toes at all!
I don't know what you're planning
with this 'audience' and 'next' talk,
But if you even TRY something 
weird I'll pummel you, got that?

original:
Aww c'moooon....

I thought it'd be more touching to
have a scene where ^P 
Dives into an explosion to rescue 
their friends or something!
translation:
Aww c'moooon....

I thought it'd be more touching to
have a scene where ^P 
Dives into an explosion to rescue 
their friends or something!

original:
Big bro, that's enough! 
You can't say things like that!
You, me and everyone else here...

Haven't we been through enough
danger?!
translation:
Big bro, that's enough! 
You can't say things like that!
You, me and everyone else here...

Haven't we been through enough
danger?!

original:
Wha-?!

A-ahhh... Yeah, I guess you're
right about that... sorry...
translation:
Wha-?!

A-ahhh... Yeah, I guess you're
right about that... sorry...

original:
Wow Yui, you've gotten tougher 
since we came here.
You've never have gotten mad at
Hiroyuki like that before...
translation:
Wow Yui, you've gotten tougher 
since we came here.
You've never have gotten mad at
Hiroyuki like that before...

original:
That's because coming here taught
me that if my brother's around, 
We always end up in trouble, 
like jumping into explosions!
translation:
That's because coming here taught
me that if my brother's around, 
We always end up in trouble, 
like jumping into explosions!

original:
Oh, ^P!?
Welcome back, Calu!
Thanks to you, the Tree's 
Evolution System...
has stabilized wonderfully!
Thank you, Calu!
translation:
Oh, ^P!?
Welcome back, Calu!
Thanks to you, the Tree's 
Evolution System...
has stabilized wonderfully!
Thank you, Calu!

original:
I don't know how, but it's 
definitely because of you!
When you were escaping from 
Archive Island...
There was an earth-shaking bang
and overwhelmingly bright light!
It temporarily shut down all of
the DigiBase's systems, Calu!
translation:
I don't know how, but it's 
definitely because of you!
When you were escaping from 
Archive Island...
There was an earth-shaking bang
and overwhelmingly bright light!
It temporarily shut down all of
the DigiBase's systems, Calu!

original:
Yeah, it sure gave me a fright!

The whole place suddenly went 
dark... it freaked me out...
translation:
Yeah, it sure gave me a fright!

The whole place suddenly went 
dark... it freaked me out...

original:
But when the lights came back on, 
the DigiBase was all fixed up! 
Even though just moments before
it was all still broken..!
translation:
But when the lights came back on, 
the DigiBase was all fixed up! 
Even though just moments before
it was all still broken..!

original:
The Selectors are gone, 
the DigiBase is fixed, 
The Digimon have returned, 
The Evolution Tree is back online.
I mean, these are all good things, 
but it makes me wonder...
Something must have happened on 
Archive Island when you left...
translation:
The Selectors are gone, 
the DigiBase is fixed, 
The Digimon have returned, 
The Evolution Tree is back online.
I mean, these are all good things, 
but it makes me wonder...
Something must have happened on 
Archive Island when you left...

original: "Something"? Like what?
translation: "Something"? Like what?

original:
I have no idea. I've never been 
there, remember?
translation:
I have no idea. I've never been 
there, remember?

original:
But look how nicely the DigiBase
was all cleaned up and fixed! 
Whatever happened, it must have 
been something good, Calu!
translation:
But look how nicely the DigiBase
was all cleaned up and fixed! 
Whatever happened, it must have 
been something good, Calu!

original:
I guess so... 
at least, I hope so...
translation:
I guess so... 
at least, I hope so...

original:
Since ^P defeated the
Selectors, maybe...
The Digital World might have begun 
returning to its former state?
translation:
Since ^P defeated the
Selectors, maybe...
The Digital World might have begun 
returning to its former state?

original:
Hey Terriermon, we can talk about
that later...
Aren't you forgetting something
important?
translation:
Hey Terriermon, we can talk about
that later...
Aren't you forgetting something
important?

original:
That's right, didn't you have 
something to give ^P?
translation:
That's right, didn't you have 
something to give ^P?

original:
Oh, that's right! 
I completely forgot!
translation:
Oh, that's right! 
I completely forgot!

original:
Alright then everyone, are you
ready?
translation:
Alright then everyone, are you
ready?

original:
As something worthy of the great
Tamer who saved the Digital World,
In behalf of all of the Digimon and
Tamers in this world...
please accept this gift, as thanks♪
translation:
As something worthy of the great
Tamer who saved the Digital World,
In behalf of all of the Digimon and
Tamers in this world...
please accept this gift, as thanks♪

original:
Obtained a Legendary Weapon!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Legendary Weapon!
^i

original:
Once again, we thank you from the 
bottom of our hearts. 
Without you, the Digital World 
would have been completely lost.
translation:
Once again, we thank you from the 
bottom of our hearts. 
Without you, the Digital World 
would have been completely lost.

original:
Or at the very least, we wouldn't
be here anymore...
So thank you, ^P♪
translation:
Or at the very least, we wouldn't
be here anymore...
So thank you, ^P♪

original:
I want to thank you too. Both for
saving Yui...
...And for stopping me when I 
wasn't thinking straight.
translation:
I want to thank you too. Both for
saving Yui...
...And for stopping me when I 
wasn't thinking straight.

original:
I guess I should also thank you.

You really saved me, in a lot of 
ways...
translation:
I guess I should also thank you.

You really saved me, in a lot of 
ways...

original:
Even though my brother and I 
caused you so much trouble, 
You came to save us over and 
over again. Thank you, so much.
translation:
Even though my brother and I 
caused you so much trouble, 
You came to save us over and 
over again. Thank you, so much.

original:
You stepped in for us so many 
times too, ^P. 
We really, truly appreciate it. 

You've really grown to become an
amazing Tamer, ^P.
translation:
You stepped in for us so many 
times too, ^P. 
We really, truly appreciate it. 

You've really grown to become an
amazing Tamer, ^P.

original:
I have to be honest. When I first 
met you, I wasn't expecting much. 
I thought to myself, "This kid'll
need help. I guess I'll do it."
But in the end, it was you who 
kept helping US!
translation:
I have to be honest. When I first 
met you, I wasn't expecting much. 
I thought to myself, "This kid'll
need help. I guess I'll do it."
But in the end, it was you who 
kept helping US!

original:
If you hadn't come back then,
^P...
We'd probably all be Erasers 
by now, Calu!
It sends shivers down my spine 
just thinking about it...
I have plenty to thank you for,
^P, Calu♪
translation:
If you hadn't come back then,
^P...
We'd probably all be Erasers 
by now, Calu!
It sends shivers down my spine 
just thinking about it...
I have plenty to thank you for,
^P, Calu♪

original:
That reminds me... after hearing of 
your achievements, ^P,
More and more Digimon are coming
here and asking for your help!
It seems like a load of new 
requests have hit the Quest PC!
translation:
That reminds me... after hearing of 
your achievements, ^P,
More and more Digimon are coming
here and asking for your help!
It seems like a load of new 
requests have hit the Quest PC!

original:
I saw them! The number of 
requests is incredible!
You're super popular now, 
^P! But I totally get it...
No matter how tough the request,
you can definitely handle it♪
translation:
I saw them! The number of 
requests is incredible!
You're super popular now, 
^P! But I totally get it...
No matter how tough the request,
you can definitely handle it♪

original:
Hey, ummm... Big bro? Asuka?

Wasn't our stay this time 
meant to be just for celebration?
translation:
Hey, ummm... Big bro? Asuka?

Wasn't our stay this time 
meant to be just for celebration?

original:
That's right, Hiroyuki dragged
us right back here after he 
said we'd return straight away, 
but...
^P literally just finished 
fighting the Selectors, remember?
translation:
That's right, Hiroyuki dragged
us right back here after he 
said we'd return straight away, 
but...
^P literally just finished 
fighting the Selectors, remember?

original:
Oh yeah... sorry about that, 
^P.
I guess we got a little 
overexcited, huh?
translation:
Oh yeah... sorry about that, 
^P.
I guess we got a little 
overexcited, huh?

original:
Well, why don't we let ^P
take a break for a while. 
And since we've come all this 
way...
The rest of us can help out
around the DigiBase instead!
translation:
Well, why don't we let ^P
take a break for a while. 
And since we've come all this 
way...
The rest of us can help out
around the DigiBase instead!

original:
Hey, while I'm totally fine with
helping out and all,
Doesn't that kinda kill off the 
festive mood we've got going?
So I've got an even better idea!

We should hold a 'Congratulations
Hiroyuki' party and...
translation:
Hey, while I'm totally fine with
helping out and all,
Doesn't that kinda kill off the 
festive mood we've got going?
So I've got an even better idea!

We should hold a 'Congratulations
Hiroyuki' party and...

original:
Sure, sure, we already know how 
much you want to be congratulated!
But nobody intends to hold a
congratulatory party for you!
So quit your whining and get to 
work!
translation:
Sure, sure, we already know how 
much you want to be congratulated!
But nobody intends to hold a
congratulatory party for you!
So quit your whining and get to 
work!

original:
Ahhh, Dos, Dos!
You're getting it all wrong...!
The setting over here should only 
go from 2488 to 2702.
You should be connecting the 
leftover part to 402 instead.
Then you need to replace values 
3231 through 2502 at 501 next...
...Over?
translation:
Ahhh, Dos, Dos!
You're getting it all wrong...!
The setting over here should only 
go from 2488 to 2702.
You should be connecting the 
leftover part to 402 instead.
Then you need to replace values 
3231 through 2502 at 501 next...
...Over?

original:
Arghhh! I've had enough of this!
Just be quiet already!
I can't concentrate with all that
blabbering coming from beside me!
translation:
Arghhh! I've had enough of this!
Just be quiet already!
I can't concentrate with all that
blabbering coming from beside me!

original:
Isn't it your fault we ended up like
this in the first place...?
translation:
Isn't it your fault we ended up like
this in the first place...?

original:
Right?
Isn't that why I told you, 
"Cut Kernel off from the Evolution
System completely."
But no, you just HAD to go get a 
backup...
translation:
Right?
Isn't that why I told you, 
"Cut Kernel off from the Evolution
System completely."
But no, you just HAD to go get a 
backup...

original:
I was preparing for a worst-case
scenario! 
If we'd deleted the backup, 
we might have been done for!
translation:
I was preparing for a worst-case
scenario! 
If we'd deleted the backup, 
we might have been done for!

original:
What are you getting so worked 
up about? You must calm down. 
Firstly, what in the world did 
you three DO that could have 
damaged the Ancient Tree 
this badly?
And you erased those Digimon and 
Tamers without permission, too. 
If you don't return them to normal,
even I won't be able to cover for you.
...Over?
translation:
What are you getting so worked 
up about? You must calm down. 
Firstly, what in the world did 
you three DO that could have 
damaged the Ancient Tree 
this badly?
And you erased those Digimon and 
Tamers without permission, too. 
If you don't return them to normal,
even I won't be able to cover for you.
...Over?

original:
That idiot... does he seriously 
not remember??
Who does he think caused this
whole mess in the first place?!
Hey Dos, just erase him already!
Nothing's worth this!
translation:
That idiot... does he seriously 
not remember??
Who does he think caused this
whole mess in the first place?!
Hey Dos, just erase him already!
Nothing's worth this!

original:
I'm definitely in favor of erasing 
him.
translation:
I'm definitely in favor of erasing 
him.

original:
While I'm all for erasing him, too...

Isn't he connected to the Ancient
Tree's Evolution System? 
If we erase him, he'll just 
restart all over again...
translation:
While I'm all for erasing him, too...

Isn't he connected to the Ancient
Tree's Evolution System? 
If we erase him, he'll just 
restart all over again...

original:
Ugh, then there's nothing for it. 
Let's just get this over with. 
C'mon Dos, you're currently the
greatest engineer in this world. 
You stopped that idiot's 
self-destruction, cancelled the 
defragmentation, and returned all
of those Erasers to normal.
There's no way you can't fix 
the Ancient Tree as well!
translation:
Ugh, then there's nothing for it. 
Let's just get this over with. 
C'mon Dos, you're currently the
greatest engineer in this world. 
You stopped that idiot's 
self-destruction, cancelled the 
defragmentation, and returned all
of those Erasers to normal.
There's no way you can't fix 
the Ancient Tree as well!

original:
I don't know whether I can fix 
this, but, well...
Since it's come to this, all I can do 
is give it a try.
translation:
I don't know whether I can fix 
this, but, well...
Since it's come to this, all I can do 
is give it a try.

original:
Ahhh, Dos, Dos!

Enough with the idle chatter, just
get back to work!
We don't have much time, so you
need to hurry it up.
...Over?
translation:
Ahhh, Dos, Dos!

Enough with the idle chatter, just
get back to work!
We don't have much time, so you
need to hurry it up.
...Over?

original:
You're the one who needs to quit 
the idle chatter, moron! 
If you don't, I'm gonna tie you to
the Digiship and swing you from it!
translation:
You're the one who needs to quit 
the idle chatter, moron! 
If you don't, I'm gonna tie you to
the Digiship and swing you from it!

original:
But can we really resurrect our
friends who've been erased...?
I have a bad feeling about it, 
somehow...
translation:
But can we really resurrect our
friends who've been erased...?
I have a bad feeling about it, 
somehow...

original:
What's that, nume?
Looks like a huge tunnel...
translation:
What's that, nume?
Looks like a huge tunnel...

original:
Whoa! You actually did it!
You resurrected our friend!
I knew you could do it, Dos!
You're a genius!
translation:
Whoa! You actually did it!
You resurrected our friend!
I knew you could do it, Dos!
You're a genius!

original:
.....wait, it's just Numemon!

Come on, can you quit fooling 
around?!
translation:
.....wait, it's just Numemon!

Come on, can you quit fooling 
around?!

original:
Ahhh, Dos! Dos!
Just ignore that racket. 
You're a prodigy, after all!
Give it your all!
But kindly hurry up, and be 
thorough while you're at it!
...Over?
translation:
Ahhh, Dos! Dos!
Just ignore that racket. 
You're a prodigy, after all!
Give it your all!
But kindly hurry up, and be 
thorough while you're at it!
...Over?

original:
...Is there seriously nothing we can
do about this guy...?
translation:
...Is there seriously nothing we can
do about this guy...?

original:
Ahhh, Dos! Dos!
Hurry, Hurry!
Make sure you do it speedily,
thoroughly, precisely and reliably!
...Over?
translation:
Ahhh, Dos! Dos!
Hurry, Hurry!
Make sure you do it speedily,
thoroughly, precisely and reliably!
...Over?

original:
Gah! Just shut up already! 

If you want him to make any 
progress then go get lost!
translation:
Gah! Just shut up already! 

If you want him to make any 
progress then go get lost!

original:
Heheh...♪
I just had a brilliant idea.
A very simple way to shut Kernel
up for a while...
translation:
Heheh...♪
I just had a brilliant idea.
A very simple way to shut Kernel
up for a while...

original:
And that'd be what, exactly?
You gonna feed him to a Digimon??
That'd destroy the poor Digimon's
stomach...
translation:
And that'd be what, exactly?
You gonna feed him to a Digimon??
That'd destroy the poor Digimon's
stomach...

original:
We'll open a Legend Tamer match
at the Colosseum!
Look, isn't the data for it in the 
Tamer Union Library there?
translation:
We'll open a Legend Tamer match
at the Colosseum!
Look, isn't the data for it in the 
Tamer Union Library there?

original:
Hah, now I get it!
Great work, Tres!
translation:
Hah, now I get it!
Great work, Tres!

original:
Dos!

Access the Colosseum data 
right now!
Open up the Legend Tamer
Rank-Up Battle!
translation:
Dos!

Access the Colosseum data 
right now!
Open up the Legend Tamer
Rank-Up Battle!

original:
I'm a little busy over here! Do you 
seriously need to add more work?!
What on earth is so important?!
And right now?!
translation:
I'm a little busy over here! Do you 
seriously need to add more work?!
What on earth is so important?!
And right now?!

original:
Don't you get it?

It'll keep this idiot quiet for a while!
translation:
Don't you get it?

It'll keep this idiot quiet for a while!

original:
Oh! Now that you mention it, 
you're absolutely right! 
Okay, I'll overwrite the Colosseum
data right away then♪
translation:
Oh! Now that you mention it, 
you're absolutely right! 
Okay, I'll overwrite the Colosseum
data right away then♪

original: Great! We'll leave it to you, Dos!
translation: Great! We'll leave it to you, Dos!

original:
Looking good! 
You're the best, Dos!
That's the spirit! Don't give up!
You're almost there! You can do it!
You can achieve anything if you
just try!
...Over?
translation:
Looking good! 
You're the best, Dos!
That's the spirit! Don't give up!
You're almost there! You can do it!
You can achieve anything if you
just try!
...Over?

original:
Whoa, Dos, easy there! 
Just keep it together a little more!
If you don't hurry and open the
Legend Tamer battle...
Who's to say how long this idiot
will keep blabbering on!
translation:
Whoa, Dos, easy there! 
Just keep it together a little more!
If you don't hurry and open the
Legend Tamer battle...
Who's to say how long this idiot
will keep blabbering on!

original:
I would have been done a long
time ago,
If it weren't for this fluttering 
idiot hanging around!
...............................
Alright, it should be good to go!
The Legend Tamer battle is now
open for entries!
translation:
I would have been done a long
time ago,
If it weren't for this fluttering 
idiot hanging around!
...............................
Alright, it should be good to go!
The Legend Tamer battle is now
open for entries!

original:
Without him around, we can finally
make some progress♪
The evil Kernel was definitely 
cruel, but...
Somehow the good Kernel is 
so much worse!
translation:
Without him around, we can finally
make some progress♪
The evil Kernel was definitely 
cruel, but...
Somehow the good Kernel is 
so much worse!

original:
Enough about him,

Let's hurry and finish this off so 
we can escape somewhere!
Maybe somewhere like...
The Real World!
translation:
Enough about him,

Let's hurry and finish this off so 
we can escape somewhere!
Maybe somewhere like...
The Real World!

original: ....um, no thanks.
translation: ....um, no thanks.

original:
If you're looking for the Bandits, 
they've already left, nume. 
They left to chase down an 
unfulfilled dream or something. 
I have no idea where they went or 
what they're planning, nume, but...
they left a message for you, 
^P. 
Let's see here...

"We acknowledge you as a member
of the Bandits from now on.
You can't cancel that membership,
by the way♪
See you, Champion.
Thanks, and goodbye."
translation:
If you're looking for the Bandits, 
they've already left, nume. 
They left to chase down an 
unfulfilled dream or something. 
I have no idea where they went or 
what they're planning, nume, but...
they left a message for you, 
^P. 
Let's see here...

"We acknowledge you as a member
of the Bandits from now on.
You can't cancel that membership,
by the way♪
See you, Champion.
Thanks, and goodbye."

original:
They were pretty hopeless right
up until the very end, weren't they?
translation:
They were pretty hopeless right
up until the very end, weren't they?

original:
Thank goodness...
You're finally awake.
translation:
Thank goodness...
You're finally awake.

original:
Don't worry about it, everyone
faints at least once or twice.
What's important isn't winning
or losing...
But never giving up, no matter
what!
translation:
Don't worry about it, everyone
faints at least once or twice.
What's important isn't winning
or losing...
But never giving up, no matter
what!

original:
Oh, ^P
Are you doing okay?
Everyone has high hopes for you.
Good luck♪
translation:
Oh, ^P
Are you doing okay?
Everyone has high hopes for you.
Good luck♪

original:
Hang in there, ^P.
Are you okay?
translation:
Hang in there, ^P.
Are you okay?
